results.title: A Matter of care: a review of the work of the Repatriation Department
results.creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Frank Bagnall and Cecil Holmes
results.brief_description: Examines the work being done by the Department of repatriation. In the hospitals the effect of the Department’s activities can be seen in terms of the actual people who receive assistance and care. Also shows the social workers helping with problems of adjustment and therapy and training classes aimed at creating new interest in life. Script and direction by Cecil Holmes.

results.title: A Matter of attitudes
results.brief_description: Patrick Watson and Laurier Lapierre undertake a survey of the extent of water and air pollution in Canada. What they discover provides abundant evidence of our prodigal abuse of precious natural resources. That action is necessary, everyone in the film agrees, but there is less accord as to whether responsibility rests with industry, government, or municipality.

results.title: A Matter of attitude: older people confronting the fear of frailty
results.brief_description: Introduced by Ruth Cracknell, this program interviews five older Australians who are prime examples of how life can be exciting and fulfilling - even if you happen to be frail. They each have their own life experiences to recount, but they are united by their ability to set achievable goals for activity levels; focus on capabilities rather than the things they can’t do; and a willingness to seek help for everyday activities if they can’t perform them independently. Produced by ABC Television (Queensland) in collaboration with the Office of Ageing in the Department of Families, Youth and Community Care, Queensland.

results.title: A Mandate to assist
results.creator_credit: United Nations Films and Ramakantha Sarma
results.brief_description: The Jengka Triangle Program located 120 miles north-east of Kuala Lumpur involves a broad spectrum of development activities - clearing of jungle areas, planting of rubber trees and oil palms, resettlement of thousands of under-employed families from overworked agricultural areas and the establishment of new communities with provision for health care and education. The project is a joint undertaking of the Malaysian Government and the World Bank, and provides a vivid example of the international community’s mandate to assist developing countries.

results.title: A Man with a plan
results.brief_description: This animated film illustrates the organization and functioning of Labor-Management Production Committees (L.M.P.C.). Through the account of an L.M.P.C. organizer we learn how such committees serve to improve labor-management relations, factory efficiency, employee morale and accident safety records. He tells how, upon visiting a factory where there was friction between management and labor, he was able to clear away the individual objections of the manager, the superintendent, the union president and a laborer to an L.M.P.C., and to help start a committee in their factory.

results.title: A Man on trial
results.brief_description: What happens in England when a man is arrested and put on trial on a charge of burglary; illustrated by the case of John Ludd who was caught one night running away from a house that had been broken into. The film follows the course of justice stage by stage, giving details of police and court procedure; and shows how the rights of the accused man are safeguarded, whatever his previous record.

results.title: A Man of the world: H.H. the Aga Khan
results.creator_credit: BBC-TV, Anthony de Lotbinière and Georges Robin
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Pacemakers”.
The Aga Khan is the creator of one of the world’s most dramatic and imaginative development schemes - a planned riviera along 35 miles of Sardinia’s Costa Smeralda. He is also the spiritual leader of more than 12 million Ismaili-Muslims scattered around the world, and a wealthy Parisian, racehourse owner, and Olympic skier. Shows the Aga Khan in a variety of activities. He comments personally, analysing himself and his different faces with the same detached lucidity he brings to all his undertakings.
